Posted By: Mickacabra (4/28/2012 8:08:59 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
She looks bad, but a first glance can be deceiving.  
  
In her set she is actually pretty strong when you play her with creatures like the [goldnight commander](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=goldnight commander). Additionally she has flying and a very unexciting but still reasonable body. Certainly not a bad card.  
  
I can understand why people dislike it, since we have been spoiled with several token producers that are vastly superior([Cloudgoat Ranger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cloudgoat Ranger), [Patagia Viper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Patagia Viper)...). Still, consider those cards as just very good and poweful cards, and this one as less but still fairly powerful.
posts.html:
She looks bad, but a first glance can be deceiving.

In her set she is actually pretty strong when you play her with creatures like the goldnight commander. Additionally she has flying and a very unexciting but still reasonable body. Certainly not a bad card.

I can understand why people dislike it, since we have been spoiled with several token producers that are vastly superior(Cloudgoat Ranger, Patagia Viper...). Still, consider those cards as just very good and poweful cards, and this one as less but still fairly powerful.

posts.post_content: The thing about this card that I enjoy is the fact that she isn't abusable but relatively on the curve with Cathar's Crusade, the card she is essentially meant to play. Imagine when its out. you have not only a 5/5 flying body for 6 but also a 2/2 body on the ground. not to mention whatever is also in play at that point too. Not to mention other Wheenie-based enchantments that is still in standard or if you guys are looking ahead Return to Ravnica's Slenseya's global populate mechanics and boost, this card becomes relatively more worth wild than people think

Posted By: LordTaco (9/27/2012 6:06:39 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This one has great art and a pretty powerful theme. She's a voice from heaven that calls the people to action for what is righteous as she guides them from overhead into battle. She's confident and looks as though she's telling the viewer, "Avacyn's returned. Now is our time to take back Innistrad. Are you ready?"
  
   
Unfortunately, she really isn't that good at all. It would take at least 2 tokens to make her decent. Even if you're concidering flickering her in and out of the field, there are so many better "enter the battlefield" effects on other creatures recently. One human token for basically ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![White](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=W&type=symbol) doesn't impress me. Flash would help, but if it was an activated ability like "![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![White](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=W&type=symbol): put a 1/1 white Human creature token onto the battlefield" then she'd be looking right.
  
   
2.0/5
posts.html:
This one has great art and a pretty powerful theme. She's a voice from heaven that calls the people to action for what is righteous as she guides them from overhead into battle. She's confident and looks as though she's telling the viewer, "Avacyn's returned. Now is our time to take back Innistrad. Are you ready?"

Unfortunately, she really isn't that good at all. It would take at least 2 tokens to make her decent. Even if you're concidering flickering her in and out of the field, there are so many better "enter the battlefield" effects on other creatures recently. One human token for basically doesn't impress me. Flash would help, but if it was an activated ability like ": put a 1/1 white Human creature token onto the battlefield" then she'd be looking right.

2.0/5
